entities.name: SCHWAB
entities.description: Schwab is a service provider that will open an account for you to receive and trade shares of Common Stock.

entities.name: THE COMPANY
entities.description: The Company may transfer Personal Data to third-party service providers to ensure compliance with applicable tax, exchange control, securities, and labor law.

entities.name: EUROPEAN COMMISSION
entities.description: The European Commission determines adequacy findings for data protection.

entities.name: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE
entities.description: The U.S. Department of Commerce sets forth the EU-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework and Swiss-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework.

entities.name: COURT OF JUSTICE OF THE EU
entities.description: The Court of Justice of the EU made a judgment in Case C-311/18 affecting the EU-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework.

relationships.relationship_description: Schwab is a service provider for The Company, opening accounts for trading shares of Common Stock.
The Company complies with data protection adequacy findings determined by the European Commission.
The Company adheres to the Privacy Shield Principles set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce.

relationships.target_entity: COURT OF JUSTICE OF THE EU
relationships.relationship_description: The Company is affected by the judgment of the Court of Justice of the EU in Case C-311/18 regarding the EU-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework.
